contest-event.event-date:
Aug. 29, 1859 D South Yorkshire Band Contest
South Yorkshire Band Contest 0 Other
south-yorkshire-band-contest
None
Doncaster, South Yorkshire, England, UK See http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc42.htm http://www.ibew.org.uk/misc37.htm
Prizes: 1st: £12 and "The Doncaster Cup" (value £10) 2nd: £7 3rd: £4 4th: £2
In addition the Doncaster Victoria Band, Boulton Band and Brodsworth Band played in a non-competitive capacity.
This was the first South Yorkshire Band Contest.
July 19, 2011, 2:37 p.m. July 21, 2011, 10:08 a.m.
